title: The Silver Screen Specter
synopsis: A detective investigates a series of strange occurrences at a vintage movie palace, only to uncover a ghost story that hits too close to home.

title: Echoes of Andromeda
synopsis: A lone astronaut on a mission to the Andromeda galaxy discovers a signal that could be the key to humanity's survival, or its ultimate doom.

title: The Last Alchemist
synopsis: In a world where magic is fading, the last living alchemist embarks on a quest to restore the balance before a permanent darkness falls.
